channel.title: [317 PI] NPC Giving Please Help

item.title: [317 PI] NPC Giving Please Help
item.dc:creator: @Stylo_HD Stylo HD
item.description:
@Stylo_HD wrote:

Okay, so i added an NPC (263) to my server so it would give the player Bone Weapons if the player had a bone key… but when i compiled, getting no errors, i log in and the npc doesnt do anything when I click it…

Heres what i put into my Actionhandler.java

case 263: if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(605,1)) { c.getItems().deleteItem(605,1); c.getItems().addItem(5016, 1); c.getItems().addItem(5018, 1); } else { c.sendMessage("You need a Bone Key to Recieve the Bone Weapons."); } break;

Read full topic
